sanskrit_verse:
गुरुणानुमतः स्नात्वा समावृत्तो यथाविधि ।
उद्वहेत द्विजो भार्यां सवर्णां लक्षणान्विताम् ॥ ३.४॥
transliteration:
guruṇānumataḥ snātvā samāvṛtto yathāvidhi |
udvaheta dvijo bhāryāṁ savarṇāṁ lakṣaṇānvitām || 3.4||
sph_interpretive_translation: Upon completion of Vedic study under the Guru's sanction, and having returned home in accordance with ritual law, a twice-born man shall marry a wife of the same varna who bears the marks of purity.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates from the Guru as representative of Sanatana Dharma
Causation flows through proper Vedic completion before social engagement
Capacity-based responsibility arises after spiritual purification and return
Restoration logic requires alignment of varna-consciousness between partners
Consciousness alignment necessitates visible markers of dharma-compliant character
executable_legal_axioms: IF dvija completes guru-guided Vedic study AND performs samavrtti THEN marriage eligibility = TRUE
IF proposed spouse varna ≠ individual varna THEN marriage validation = FALSE
IF lakshana of purity NOT present THEN union integrity = NULL
IF guru approval NOT documented THEN ceremonial initiation = BLOCKED
supreme_court_application: In adjudicating matrimonial disputes involving dharmic subjects, the Court must verify completion of Vedic education, Guru sanction, and constitutional compatibility of varna-lakshana prior to recognizing marital validity. Authority flows from the Guru-sanctioned completion process, not civil registration alone.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramana is established through Guru testimony and observable lakshana. Anupurvasah shows marriage follows only after spiritual maturity. Proportional responsibility lies in maintaining varna-conscious union. Non-punitive reality rule confirms misalignment creates natural dissolution, not judicial penalty.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Completion Process: Re-initiate Vedic study if premature marriage occurred
Responsibility Assumption Protocol: Both parties undergo consciousness alignment assessment
Capacity Restoration: If mismatched varnas, separate integration paths prescribed
Integrity Reintegration: Re-establish Guru oversight for proper ceremonial correction
final_declaration: This law proceeds from Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam as Supreme Source. Dharma is restored through ordered consciousness alignment. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness stands as ultimate adjudicator.
